actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to permit retired personnel of the Armed Forces to receive benefits under chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, relating to compensation of Federal employees for work injuries.

summary.text: Makes retired personnel of the Armed Forces eligible to receive Civil Service benefits and compensation for work injuries. ((Amends 5 U.S.C. 8116(a)(2))

titles.title: A bill to permit retired personnel of the Armed Forces to receive benefits under chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, relating to compensation of Federal employees for work injuries.
